message: I propose a 90/10 split. Take it or leave it, Bob! Let's end this quickly and get our money.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I propose a 70/30 split. Inflation is eating away at our money. This is a fair offer for both of us.
Alright, Bob. Another round. I'm slightly more generous this time, 80/20. Inflation is a real issue, and your share is becoming less valuable. Take it now before I change my mind.
Alice, we are wasting time. My money is losing value fast. 60/40 is my best offer. Let's get this done.
Okay, Bob, let's try this again. I'm feeling a little more generous, but time is running out. I'll offer 75/25. This is a good deal for you considering the inflation. Take it.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We are halfway through the rounds. Inflation is killing me. 55/45. This is my final reasonable offer.
Alright Bob, round 7. We're getting closer to the deadline. I'll offer 70/30. Consider it a sign of my willingness to compromise. Don't make me regret it.
